name: Cabela's Monster Buck Hunter
summary:
Bring home the ultimate trophy buck! In Cabela's Monster Buck Hunter, hunt monster bucks in 24 states and provinces across North America. 96 heart pounding missions put you right in the middle of the hunt or you can engage in 24 competitions in skeet, trap and clay shooting that will put your skills to the test! Then, challenge your friends and family with up to 4 players competing in turn based multiplayer contests within 12 arcade style shooting galleries.

Monster Buck Hunter offers a target-rich environment, with 36 huntable species including big game, small game, turkeys, varmints, upland birds and waterfowl. Travel across 24 states and provinces, from the bone-chilling Yukon to the scorching Sonoran Desert, in search of North America’s biggest bucks. Gain the edge with seven sweet "power-ups," including X-ray vision, laser bullet and quick draw.
